task.summary: Default task
ready for wp.org submission
minor updates for wordpress.org submission
small updates from additional review
loop-pagination update, removed CMB from licenses, added missing files. v1.04
added fix for Disqus saying 'comments are closed'
* added data validation to theme customizer functions * added custom customizer control for url input in social icons function
* updated conditional logic for IE class in header
* added grunt
* js files unminifed and one concatenated, minified js file enqueued
tagging as v1.04
tagging as v1.05
* removed admin dashboard widget * created theme options pages * added content for dashboard page
* added logo positioning and size adjustment functionality * added styles and finalized content for Ignite Dashboard page
* implemented new hybrid core v2.0 * updated sidebar and post class functions to work with hybrid core 2.0
* changed method for registering primary menu b/c of hyrbid core switch
* added filter to remove text after comments form
* updated footer link
* added content/style to premium page
* added menu icon logo * tagging as 1.1
* made update for PHP version 5.3 compatability
* added min-width to sub-menu
* adjusted logo size function for new single input approach
* added JS to hide show appropriate logo size input * adjusted logo selector to #logo * added #logo id to logo
* updated theme options page to display custom background feature
added custom background to theme options page
changed how featured image support is added. added featured image to pages.
changed page and 404 classes to work with hybrid. added styles for featured images on pages.
added space between opening php tag and bracket at bottom of functions-admin
fixed input styling issues
tagging as v1.15
fixed html validation errors
tagging as v1.16
added show full post option
added show full post output
added conditional to show excerpts always on search pages
tagging as v1.17 and added more color tags
simplified logo size tools to just use a max-width and max-height both visible at all times to users
updated featured image to padding-bottom %
updated social icon display to work based on available space
updated social icon display to work better
updated styling to work better with social icons
no longer using styles-prefixed.css
social media icon styling restricted to site-header icons
updated content-attachment page to work with galleries
fixed problem with date
added missing text domains
added fix for .more-link stretching
removed older ie checks b/c only supporting IE9+ anyway.
removed unneeded JS for supporting IE8 and older browsers.
improved password-protected post styling
gave enqueued styles/scripts more unique handles
now enqueueing style without hybrid core. HC reset removed and gallery styles moved to _gallery.scss.
updated Font Awesome to 4.1
updated to include new FA social icons
add conditional logic for search results page title
never removed style-prefixed.css after stopped using with autoprefixer
now loading production.min.js asynchronously.
fixed missing padding-top on excerpts without a title between 800-100px
was missing quotes around input[type="file"]
stopped using tappy.js and removed it.
updated search page styling.
